definition: pragmatic/flexible/to act differently in different situations/to accommodate to circumstances
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: I was going to write my workaround and I realized that It does not work.
sentences.chinese: 我在準備寫一個變通方法時意識到它也無法工作。

sentences.english: Workarounds shouldn't be hard to find, though.
sentences.chinese: 不過，變通的辦法不難找到。

sentences.english: I think that could be an acceptable alternative for both of us .
sentences.chinese: 我想這恐怕是一個我們雙方都能接受的變通辦法。

sentences.english: There is an alternative which many small firms take. They buy microprocessors.
sentences.chinese: 很多小公司採用一種變通的辦法，就是購置微處理機。

sentences.english: The hiring manager is more likely to be flexible, says Mr. Akana.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡納表示，直接上司通常都更容易變通。
幸運的是，有一個變通方法。

sentences.english: Faced with this situation, alternative methods should be used to make treatment.
sentences.chinese: 面對這樣的情況，應當用變通的方式做出處理。

sentences.english: This rule can complicate a conversation, but there are workarounds.
sentences.chinese: 這項規定可能會給交談增加困難，但有變通的辦法。

sentences.english: A simple workaround is to use an animated value as the square root of the destination value.
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單的變通方法是用帶動畫價值的平方根目的值。

sentences.english: Several variations of border irrigation have been devised.
sentences.chinese: 畦灌的幾種變通方式已經被設想出來了。

sentences.english: Nyberg tells students to be flexible.
sentences.chinese: 尼伯格告訴學生們要學會變通。

sentences.english: It only made limitedly adaptation in the foundation of feudal ethics and rites.
sentences.chinese: 它不過是在封建禮教基礎上作出了有限的變通而已。

sentences.english: Alternatively, the sentence can be rephrased, using a plural noun.
sentences.chinese: 變通一下說法，可以改變句子的措辭，使用複數名詞。

sentences.english: Don't follow the rigid party program .
sentences.chinese: 不要遵守不變通的黨綱。

sentences.english: That is something we would be flexible about.
sentences.chinese: 對此有許多事需要我們加以變通。

sentences.english: It especially gives detailed demonstration to some adaptive factor of the regular movements.
sentences.chinese: 尤其對其中的固定動作變通要領作了詳細的示範。

definition: to satisfy both sides/to accommodate both (demands)
to comprehend (new things) by analogy
reward and punishment
scholastic attainments
plain/clear/obvious
to confuse one thing with another (idiom); to muddle
to guide patiently and systematically (idiom)
to give instructions/to give advice
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
initiative/active role
to change according to the situation (idiom); pragmatic
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
arbitrary/subjective/dogmatic
superficial
to seize every opportunity/to be full of tricks
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
